name: Curivari - Sun Grown - No. 660
additionalNotes: The Curivari Sun Grown is one of the new standout releases from Curivari. It's a Nicaraguan puro which blends the perfect amount of body and flavor. It starts medium bodied and gradually through ends as a nice medium-plus that isn't overpowering. The flavors meld together perfectly with the body by bringing the taste of black pepper, leather, hay and cocoa.Â
